Html:
Hi,

Is there a way to specify which channel the audio is played out of? I'm following the sine wave tutorial from http://mark-dot-net.blogspot.com/2009/10/playback-of-sine-wave-in-naudio.html and I'm wondering if I can tell one SineWaveProvider32/WaveProvider32 to output to the left channel and another to output to the right channel.

well you could make another IWaveProvider that interleaved samples from your two SineWaveProviders. Ultimately I would like to add an IWaveProvider mixer which should do this. Have a look at the WaveChannel32 and WaveMixerStream for the WaveStream way of doing this.

Mark
